summary: Наконец, наконец, вы подумали, вышел новый мод, и к тому же годный, сделал сборку анимаций для скайрима по тематике ведьмака, ещё ракомендую вместе с этим модом ставить Dodge, чтоб втянуться =), Рас

[font=arial, sans-serif][color=#ff0000][size=4]Finally, finally, you thought, there was a new mod, and besides, it was suitable, made an assembly of animations for skyrim on the subject of the witcher, I also recommend using this mod to put Dodge in order to get involved =), The arrangement is allowed only with the author and the reference to profileTo throw a folder on a way C: \ Games \ The Elder Scrolls 5 Skyrim \ Data \ meshes \ actors \ character[/size][/color][/font]To throw a folder on a way C: \ Games \ The Elder Scrolls 5 Skyrim \ Data \ meshes \ actors \ characterw mod, and besides, it was suitable, made an assembly of animations for skyrim on the subject of the witcher, I also recommend using this mod to put Dodge in order to get involved =), The arrangement is allowed only with the author and the reference to PGTo throw a folder on a way C: \ Games \ The Elder Scrolls 5 Skyrim \ Data \ meshes \ actors \ character
